column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The Art Institute is one of my favorite attractions in Chicago
column2: and I'm not a tourist. Especially in the winter months
column3: it is so nice to walk around in a quiet atmosphere and admire the different forms of artistic beauty on display. No matter how many times I go
column4: I always notice something that I hadn't before and learn something new. Whether you're holding hands on a date
column7: or just taking a break from the outside world
column8: this is the spot in Chicago for a lovely afternoon.
